title: Hood Canal-HCchum2020 — Hood Canal-HCchum2020
text: csv file. SERIES certain populations, multiple types spawner count data. example survey model counts based different methods. case, 'Series' column gives name dataset distinguish data sets population. ESU ESU DPS name. SPECIES Species name. METHOD Method spawner count. Survey refers spawning ground survey; count expansion. See SPS (database link sources ) details data. LadderCount weir dam count. Model  refers DABOM model expands PIT tag data. GSI expansion based BOXCAR model, uses GSI allocate fish sampled Lower Granite Dam. MAJOR_POPULATION_GROUP Major population group within ESU DPS. NMFS_POPID NWFSC id population. POPULATION_NAME Long population name. COMMON_POPULATION_NAME Shorter population name used Viability Report figures tables. RUN_TIMING Run timing (fall, winter, spring, etc). missing, see ESU/DPS name may applicable species. YEAR Integer XXXX format. year count made. See details ESU DPS specific comments. NUMBER_OF_SPAWNERS Total spawners escapement count. -99 means missing count. May integer decimal. FRACWILD Decimal 0 1. Fraction wild natural. -99 means missing information. CONTRIBUTOR Data contributor. Listed Source . COMPILER NWFSC staff compiled data file: Mari Williams CITATION Data citation. Listed References .

title: Hood Canal-HCchum2020 — Hood Canal-HCchum2020
text: WDFW, Point Point Treaty Council

title: Hood Canal-HCchum2020 — Hood Canal-HCchum2020
text: Ford, M.J., et al. 2022. Biological Viability Assessment Update Pacific Salmon Steelhead Listed Endangered Species Act: Pacific Northwest. U.S. Department Commerce, NOAA Technical Memorandum NMFS-NWFSC-171. https://doi.org/10.25923/kq2n-ke70 Salmon Population Summaries (SPS) Database: https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/resource/tool-app/salmon-population-summaries-sps Original source: Strait Juan de Fuca: Hood Canal Summer Chum Natural Origin Spawner Abundance (1971-2019). Spawner abundance data. Point Point Treaty Council Washington Department Fish Wildlife. Personal Communication Mindy Rowse, 2020. Hood Canal: Hood Canal Summer Chum Natural Origin Spawner Abundance (1968-2019). Spawner abundance data. Point Point Treaty Council Washington Department Fish Wildlife. Personal Communication Mindy Rowse, 2020.

title: Hood Canal-HCchum2020 — Hood Canal-HCchum2020
code: data('Hood Canal-HCchum2020') library(ggplot2) out$NUMBER_OF_SPAWNERS[out$NUMBER_OF_SPAWNERS==-99] <- NA ggplot(out, aes(x=YEAR, y=NUMBER_OF_SPAWNERS)) +    geom_point(na.rm = TRUE) +   ggtitle('Hood Canal-HCchum2020') +   facet_wrap(~COMMON_POPULATION_NAME) +   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust=1))   out$FRACWILD[out$FRACWILD == -99] <- NA ggplot(out, aes(x=YEAR, y=FRACWILD)) +   geom_point(na.rm = TRUE) +   ggtitle('Fraction Wild') +   ylim(0,1) +   facet_wrap(~COMMON_POPULATION_NAME) +   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust=1))
